# VoiceOverPlaybackUnity Class

Handles playback of voice over <see cref="!:AudioClip"></see>s referenced
on <see cref="!:YarnScript"></see>s.


```csharp
public class VoiceOverPlaybackUnity : DialogueViewBase
```
